defaultAccounts.bio: My name is John and I am a weeaboo

defaultItems.name: Basket
defaultItems.description: This is a basket. It is useful for holding things that your puny human hands probably can't hold.

defaultItems.name: Bicycle
defaultItems.description: This is the bike that I used to try to ride bicycles, but I gave up so now I'm selling it. Please buy it, it's taking up space in my garage.
